summary: Simple mod which upgrades vampire gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s21.postimage.org/douskon2v/pic01.jpg[/img]
[color=Tan][u]Description:[/u][/color]

[color=Darkgray]This mod change vampire powers and stages by reversing their effect. Couple of new powers and features are also added. This means that player have "Embrace of Shadows" in stage[/color] 1 [color=Darkgray]and "Vampire's Seduction" in first[/color] 3 [color=Darkgray]stages. Weakness to sunlight remains untouched. These changes apply only for player, not for npc vampires (except npc vampires gain "Resist Paralysis" too).[/color] [u]Requires Dawnguard expansion[/u][color=Darkgray].[/color]


[color=Tan][u]Modified:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Vampire's Seduction" calm enemies up to level[/color] 50[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Vampire's Sight" last forever until toggled off.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Embrace of Shadows" gives Muffle effect instead of the Night-Eye.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Vampire's Servant" duration is permanent. It reanimates corpses up to level[/color] 30[color=Darkgray]/[/color]21[color=Darkgray]/[/color]13[color=Darkgray]/[/color]6[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Frost resistance is [/color]50[color=Darkgray]/[/color]40[color=Darkgray]/[/color]30[color=Darkgray]/[/color]20[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Weakness to fire is increased by [/color]25[color=Darkgray]/[/color]50[color=Darkgray]/[/color]75[color=Darkgray]/[/color]100[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Sunlight affects player from[/color] 6[color=Darkgray] am to [/color]7[color=Darkgray] pm.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Vampiric Drain" has new sounds and magicka cost is[/color] 10 [color=Darkgray]points per second. Effectiveness depends on player's level:[/color]
[/list]
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 1[color=Darkgray]-[/color]5 [color=Darkgray]=[/color] 10[color=Darkgray]/[/color]7[color=Darkgray]/[/color]4[color=Darkgray]/[/color]1
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 6[color=Darkgray]-[/color]10[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 12[color=Darkgray]/[/color]9[color=Darkgray]/[/color]6[color=Darkgray]/[/color]3
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 11[color=Darkgray]-[/color]15[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 14[color=Darkgray]/[/color]11[color=Darkgray]/[/color]8[color=Darkgray]/[/color]5
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 16[color=Darkgray]-[/color]20[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 16[color=Darkgray]/[/color]13[color=Darkgray]/[/color]10[color=Darkgray]/[/color]7
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 21[color=Darkgray]-[/color]25[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 18[color=Darkgray]/[/color]15[color=Darkgray]/[/color]12[color=Darkgray]/[/color]9
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 26[color=Darkgray]-[/color]30[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 20[color=Darkgray]/[/color]17[color=Darkgray]/[/color]14[color=Darkgray]/[/color]11
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 31[color=Darkgray]-[/color]35[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 22[color=Darkgray]/[/color]19[color=Darkgray]/[/color]16[color=Darkgray]/[/color]13
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 36[color=Darkgray]-[/color]40[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 24[color=Darkgray]/[/color]21[color=Darkgray]/[/color]18[color=Darkgray]/[/color]15
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 41[color=Darkgray]-[/color]45[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 26[color=Darkgray]/[/color]23[color=Darkgray]/[/color]20[color=Darkgray]/[/color]17
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 46[color=Darkgray]-[/color]50[color=Darkgray] =[/color] 28[color=Darkgray]/[/color]25[color=Darkgray]/[/color]22[color=Darkgray]/[/color]19
[color=Darkgray]Level[/color] 51 [color=Darkgray]and above = [/color]30[color=Darkgray]/[/color]27[color=Darkgray]/[/color]24[color=Darkgray]/[/color]21


[color=Tan][u]New:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Blood Sense" spell is available in stage[/color] 4[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Dismiss Servant" lesser power available during all stages.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Dread Cloak" power is available in stage[/color] 1[color=Darkgray] and [/color]2[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Resist Paralysis" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Frozen Heart" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Safe Fall" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Waterbreathing" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Vampiric Strength" ability. [/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Supernatural Speed" ability.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Feeding restores player's health completely.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Feeding grants "Blood Frenzy".[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Corpse feeding is available in stage[/color] 4[color=Darkgray]. Player have[/color] 1 [color=Darkgray]game hour to feed on a slayed corpse.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Player disintegrates into ashpile upon dying.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Weakness to silver weapons is increased by [/color]25[color=Darkgray]/[/color]50[color=Darkgray]/[/color]75[color=Darkgray]/[/color]100[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Vigilant of Stendarr faction members are hostile against player in any stage.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Vampires no longer attack player on sight.[/color]
[/list]

[color=Tan][u]Ranks:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Fledgling = Start rank.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Blooded =[/color] 20[color=Darkgray] days as a vampire.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Mistwalker =[/color] 60[color=Darkgray] days as a vampire.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Nightstalker =[/color] 120[color=Darkgray] days as a vampire.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Ancient =[/color] 200[color=Darkgray] days as a vampire.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Volkihar =[/color] 300[color=Darkgray] days as a vampire.[/color]
[/list]

[color=Tan][u]Bonuses:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]Fledgling = Nothing.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Blooded = [/color]8[color=Darkgray]% normal weapon resistance. "Vampiric Drain" absorbs stamina in addition of health.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Mistwalker = [/color]16[color=Darkgray]% normal weapon resistance. "Embrace of Shadows" provides[/color] 25[color=Darkgray]% Spell Absorption for the duration.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Nightstalker = [/color]24[color=Darkgray]% normal weapon resistance. Player can have two vampire servants at the same time.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Ancient = [/color]32[color=Darkgray]% normal weapon resistance. The effect of "Supernatural Speed" expands to daytime.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Volkihar = [/color]40[color=Darkgray]% normal weapon resistance. "Dread Cloak" reduces incoming damage by [/color]50[color=Darkgray]%.[/color]
[/list]

[color=Tan][u]Fixed:[/u][/color]
[list]
[color=Darkgray][*]"Nightstalker's Footsteps" correctly give[/color] 25[color=Darkgray]% bonus to sneaking.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Vampires have correct eyes.[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]Player no longer regenerates stamina, health and magicka in sunlight in stage[/color] 3[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[color=Darkgray][*]People are no longer hostile against player in stage[/color] 4[color=Darkgray].[/color]
[/list]

[color=Tan][u]Note:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Using unarmed combo attacks in brawl will cause opponent to draw he's weapons or magic. There is nothing I can do about it.[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Installation:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Extract files to Skyrim/Data folder. Use launcher and in data files select VampireUpgrade.esp. In game, if you are already a vampire, you have to feed to get scripts run properly.[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]Delete all files. [/color]

[color=Tan][u]Compatibility:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray]This mod is not compatible with mods that change [/color]PlayerVampireQuestScript[color=Darkgray] or [/color]any custom race mods[color=Darkgray].[/color]

[color=Tan][u]Credit:[/u][/color] [color=Darkgray][/color] kieranh7 [color=Darkgray]for implementing ashpile death effect for player and giving me permission to use he's script in my work.[/color] Amarutu[color=Darkgray] for giving me an advice in scripting.[/color]

[color=Tan][u]My other mods:[/u][/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5866]Werewolf Upgrade[/url] [color=Darkgray]-[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33405/]Expert Concentration Spells[/url] [color=Darkgray]-[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34620/]Lore Friendly Spells[/url]
